briefTitle: A Trial Investigating the Efficacy and Safety of Insulin Degludec/Insulin Aspart Once Daily Plus Insulin Aspart for the Remaining Meals Versus Insulin Detemir Once or Twice Daily Plus Meal Time Insulin Aspart in Children and Adolescents With Type 1 Diabetes Mellitus
officialTitle: A Trial Investigating the Efficacy and Safety of Insulin Degludec/Insulin Aspart Once Daily Plus Insulin Aspart for the Remaining Meals Versus Insulin Detemir Once or Twice Daily Plus Meal Time Insulin Aspart in Children and Adolescents With Type 1 Diabetes Mellitus
summary: This trial is conducted in Asia, Europe and North and South America. The aim of the trial is to investigate the efficacy and safety of insulin degludec/insulin aspart once daily plus insulin aspart for the remaining meals in children and adolescents with type 1 diabetes mellitus.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline in HbA1c (Glycosylated Haemoglobin) (%)
